participant_1.background: i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. i do not drink alcohol. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. my favorite movie is friday. i am a doctor. i enjoy going to the park. i'm now looking for a new job.

content.text: hello, how are you? I just got back from mountain biking, I love it
